prompts: Create a rocky Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats with a tough exterior.
I want a dual-type Pokemon that combines earth and fighting styles with a rugged appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a boulder, featuring shades of gray and orange accents.
Make a sturdy Pokemon that can withstand harsh environments and has a bipedal stance.
Imagine a creature with a tough shell and sharp features, perfect for rock-type battles.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with a color palette of green and gray.
Give me a Pokemon that stands out in caves and mountains, showcasing unique rock-like traits.
